translation.en: [woman] I can't find my fucking shoes. Where are my shoes? Hey.

NON PUOI ENTRARE NEL SOGNO SE IL SOGNO NON ENTRA IN TE - Avete visto le mie scarpe? - È arrugginito. Non funziona.
Se ti dimentichi di tutto il resto

translation.en: you have nothing to worry about.

translation.en: -Keep walking. -There's one thing you must never forget.

translation.en: Never, never, never, never, never, never, never, never forget this one thing.
translation.it: Non devi mai, mai dimenticare questa cosa.
Se ti ricordi tutto il resto

translation.en: if you forget this one thing,
and you forget this one thing, you will have done nothing in your life.
translation.it: e dimentichi questa cosa, non avrai fatto niente nella vita.

translation.en: The one thing you must never forget!
-Give me some fucking noodles! -[woman] One dollar.
translation.it: - Dammi dei cazzo di noodle! - Un dollaro.

translation.en: You don't pay, no noodle. No noodle for you, no pay.
translation.it: Niente soldi, niente noodle per te.

translation.en: No one is going to tell you.
You have to figure it out for yourself.
You have to figure it out.
If you forget everything else but this one thing,
translation.it: Se ti dimentichi tutto ma non questa cosa,

translation.en: you have nothing to worry about.
[crying] I can't do it again. Please.
translation.it: Non ce la faccio. Per favore.
Ti prego, non farlo. Per favore.

translation.en: Please don't do this. I can't do it again.
translation.it: Ti prego, non farlo. Non ce la faccio.

translation.en: I can't do it. Please. God.
translation.it: Non ce la faccio. Ti prego. Oddio.

translation.en: I'm not supposed to be here. Please don't do this.
Please, please, please, I'm begging you.
I'm begging you, please don't do this. Oh, God.
Please, I can't. No, no, no--

translation.it: Non ne posso più di questa merda.

translation.en: Sick and tired of this shit.
Look, I ain't got no problem.
I'm just out here looking for plates, that's all.
translation.it: Sono venuta a cercare dei piatti, tutto qui.

translation.en: Does your kid eat people, too?
translation.it: Anche la tua bambina mangia la gente?

translation.en: I'm just trying to live out here. Same as you.
translation.it: Cerco solo di sopravvivere. Proprio come te.
Non è facile neanche per me.
Siamo entrambe del Bad Batch, no?

translation.en: Tell me what you want and I'll do it.
translation.it: Dimmi cosa vuoi che faccia e lo farò.

translation.en: So, tell me what you want me to do
-Just tell me what you want me-- -There's fucking nothing you can do.
translation.it: - Dimmi cosa vuoi... - Non c'è un cazzo che puoi fare.

translation.en: You want me to take your socks off?
Look, no one cares about you now.
translation.it: Ascolta, a nessuno importa di te adesso.

translation.en: I could've just left you out there in the desert.
Is that where you want to be?
Now, you like this bunny, don't you?
Do you want to keep him?
Then you got to do exactly what I say.
translation.it: Allora devi fare esattamente come ti dico.

translation.en: There was a kid was with her.
You better start talking, old man.
A little bit more down here.
[man over speakers] People of Comfort, good evening!
Everybody make some noise for the one and only,
translation.it: Fatevi sentire per l'unico e inimitabile,

translation.en: [man] Come on! The Dream! Come on!
-[man] We love you! -[The Dream] I love you, too.
[man] Fill my life with the Dream!
translation.it: Tutta la mia vita, Il Sogno!

translation.en: I've been looking for you all my life!
translation.it: Ti cerco da tutta la vita!

translation.en: Why are we out here? Just what are we doing
translation.it: Perché siamo qua? Che ci facciamo

translation.en: in the middle of the goddamn desert tonight?
You want that music only Jimmy can make.
translation.it: Volete la musica che solo Jimmy sa suonare.

translation.en: Let me tell you something about Jimmy.
translation.it: Ora vi dico una cosa su Jimmy.

translation.en: This here is the Bad Batch.
Now, there's only one rule here.
translation.it: Ora, c'è una sola regola qui.

translation.en: -It's time to find the Dream. -[man] The Dream!
translation.it: - È ora di trovare Il Sogno. - Il Sogno!

translation.en: [Arlen] Where is she? She was just here.
She was right here a second ago. She was right here a second ago. She's gotta be here.
She's got to be here somewhere.
She's gotta be here. I know she's gotta be here.
She's gotta be here somewhere. Where is she?
What did I do? What did I do?
Hey, you guys seen a little girl?
What am I going to do now?
What is this? What is this place?
This place... What is this place?
Go somewhere. Here's what you do.
Go far away. You go far away.
Is that what it always looks like?
It doesn't always look like that.
Thought it was pretty at first, but...
I don't even really know what it is.
translation.it: Non so neanche bene cosa sia.

translation.en: in the darkest corner of this Earth...
and we're afraid of our own kind.
translation.it: e abbiamo paura dei nostri simili.

translation.en: You are a long way from Comfort.
You see a kid look like that?
I'm going to take you to Comfort.
And you will go inside and find her for me.
translation.it: Vai dentro e la cerchi per me.

translation.en: or nobody except that little girl.
translation.it: o di nessuno se non di quella bambina.

translation.en: But I'm going to kill you if you don't find her for me.
translation.it: E ti uccido se non me la trovi.
Questa ti fa venire più sete.

translation.en: We've got guns at the wall. They'll shoot if they see you.
translation.it: Hanno guardie armate. Ti sparano se ti vedono.

translation.en: What if I can't find her?

translation.it: Te la do per quella gamba.

translation.en: I can just keep it all for myself.
No, no, no, no, no, no!
How come you're in the Bad Batch?
translation.it: Come mai sei nel Bad Batch?

translation.en: I am born here, in Havana.
I come with a boat to America when I was 16.
translation.it: Sono arrivato in America in barca quando avevo 16 anni.

translation.en: Like, what did you do in Miami?
I do this, that. No big deal.
translation.it: Questo e quello. Niente di che.

translation.en: I got this one when I was 13.
translation.it: Mi sono fatta questo a 13 anni.

translation.en: It's from the first boy I ever loved.
translation.it: L'ho fatto col primo ragazzo che ho amato.

translation.en: We both got matching ones at the same time.
translation.it: Ci siamo fatti lo stesso tatuaggio insieme.

translation.en: You don't see things how they are.
translation.it: Non vedi le cose come sono.

translation.en: You only see things how you are.
translation.it: Le vedi come le vuoi vedere.
E non cambia niente per te.

translation.en: Come on. Come with me. Come on.
[man] Let's go. I'm getting out of here.
Come on. Hurry the fuck up.

translation.it: - Qual è il tuo numero, pazzoide? - 5828.

translation.en: Been out in the desert two days, man. I need some food.
translation.it: Sono stato nel deserto per due giorni. Ho bisogno di cibo.

translation.en: -You guys gonna help me out or what? -What's up with the white girl, man?
translation.it: Mi date una mano o no? E la ragazza bianca?

translation.en: Found her ass out there with one of them bridge people.
translation.it: L'ho trovata con uno di quelli del ponte.

translation.en: ♪ Called out into the cold night ♪
Excuse me. Have you seen this kid?

translation.it: Ha visto questa bambina da qualche parte?

translation.en: Can you look out for her, please?
translation.it: Può chiedere in giro, per favore?

translation.en: Hey, have you guys seen a little girl?

translation.it: Non ho visto un cazzo, bella.

translation.en: I wish they'd stop making pennies.
translation.it: Vorrei che non facessero i centesimi.

translation.en: -Hey. -I don't want to be a loser. I want to be a finder.
translation.it: Non voglio essere un perdente, ma uno che trova.

translation.en: Finder finds things, loser loses them.
translation.it: Non un perdente che perde le cose.

translation.en: Yeah, I need to find a kid.

translation.it: - È alta più o meno così. - Sì.

translation.en: -Where? -Hey, you want to play with my puzzle?
translation.it: - Dove? - Vuoi giocare col mio puzzle?

translation.en: No, I'm not going to play with your puzzle.

translation.en: That's the economy of Comfort sitting right in front of you.
translation.it: Questa è l'economia di Comfort proprio davanti ai tuoi occhi.

translation.en: They say you can catch more flies with honey.
translation.it: Si dice si prendano più mosche col miele.

translation.en: Remind me your name again, sweetheart.
Let me ask you a question, Arlen.
When you shit here in Comfort,
translation.it: Quando fai la cacca qua a Comfort,

translation.en: Because, uh, the toilet takes it someplace.
translation.it: Perché lo scarico la porta da qualche parte.

translation.en: It takes it where it takes it.

translation.it: che i miei figli e le mie figlie

translation.it: Le mucche stanno nella loro merda.
I maiali stanno nella loro merda

translation.it: Qualche umano deviato si è messo a fare hamburger
con la carne dei miei figli e delle mie figlie.

translation.en: We don't stand in our shit.
is because I won't let that happen.
I got each and every toilet in Comfort taking that shit
translation.it: Ho fatto sì che ogni gabinetto a Comfort prenda la merda

translation.en: and sending it down the pipes

translation.en: till it reaches a place where no one thinks about it.
translation.it: finché non arriva in un posto lontano e nessuno ci pensa più.
E nessuno ne sente la puzza.
Non è un bel gesto da parte mia?

translation.en: But you don't like it here,
translation.it: Ma a te non piace stare qui,

translation.en: It costs a lot to be here.
It cost you an arm and a leg.
translation.it: A te è costato un braccio e una gamba.

translation.en: You know what I see when I look at you?
translation.it: Sai cosa vedo quando ti guardo?

translation.en: A sailboat out on the sea.
translation.it: Una barca a vela in mezzo al mare...

translation.en: What is it you want, Arlen?
If you could have one thing...
translation.it: Se potessi avere una sola cosa...
Tutte le cose che hai fatto

translation.en: I want to be the solution for something.
translation.it: Voglio essere la soluzione per qualcosa.

translation.en: You take care of a garden
translation.it: Se ti prendi cura di un orto,

translation.en: and it takes care of you back.
translation.it: poi l'orto si prende cura di te.

translation.en: Few things in this world operate like that.
translation.it: Poche cose al mondo funzionano così.

translation.en: It just needs a place to grow.
translation.it: Gli serve solo un posto dove crescere.

translation.en: and it's part of the world.
Because you know what the Dream really is?
translation.it: Perché sai cos'è davvero Il Sogno?

translation.en: Make up a room for our guest.
translation.it: Preparate una stanza per la nostra ospite.

translation.en: I guess I'm just a bit nervous.
translation.it: Credo di essere un po' nervosa.

translation.en: Can you come in for a second?
You want to see it all over your fucking walls?
translation.it: Vuoi che ti sporchi tutte queste cazzo di pareti?

translation.en: You take care of this rabbit.
translation.it: Ti prenderai cura di questo coniglio.

translation.en: When we're out and clear of the wall, I'll let her go.

translation.en: I'm real disappointed in you, Arlen.
[Arlen] Once we're out, I'll let her go. I swear.

translation.en: What are you doing right now?
Do you want to hang out or something?

translation.en: What you think I am, gringa?

translation.en: What if all these things that happened to us happened to us
translation.it: E se quello che ci è successo ci fosse successo

translation.en: so the next things that are gonna happen to us...

translation.en: In this place, it's only death for you.

translation.en: I want spaghetti because the other man gave me spaghetti.
